name: Zombie Jail Survive
description:
A nice game
if you bored a little this game is for you.
try it and you will love it. simple game and little hard

in this version have single player point game ,single player vs bot and local multiplayer

support xbox 360 controler!!!

system requirements
Operating system:Windows XP ,Windows Vista,Windows 7
Directx 9

not sure if it will work in all computers if you got problem let me know

the game is in redevelop please send comments about the game and maybe you will get zombie jail survive 2!!!

we are using other engine for the game and better texture and more
